Posts.Content: On 5/12/2007 Antoinne wrote: After 3 years of Tamoxofin, I've been on Aromasin for 15 months.  Have been having a time with feet pain, bursitis, increased arthritis pain.  I see some messages from patients with similar symptoms, and am wondering if the symptoms decreased after a time.  I am on my second occurrence of breast cancer.  I was initially taking Tamoxifen again.  However, moved to Aromasin.  I have found that the bursitis and arthritis pain are only getting worse after 2 and 1/2 years.
Posts.Title: Aromasin pain
